parameter.value: Hiho, may Fire and Earth bless you, my child.
Farewell, |PLAYERNAME|, my child!
Farewell, |PLAYERNAME|, my child!
Well, I am Emperor Kruzak Dustbeard, son of Fire and Earth, second only to the {gods}, jawoll.
Well, I'm the emperor of the dwarfs. It's my duty to protect my folk and to see that justice is done.
Well, justice is a difficult thing. Can one be just to all at once, and if not, to whom should he be just?
Well, order is of great importance. Life has to follow rules, so do we.
Well, good and {evil} will fight each other for all eternity.
Well, {good} and evil will fight each other for all eternity.
Well, we honor Father Earth and Mother Fire. Some of us even follow the teachings of additional {gods}.
Well, Durin is one of the celestial {paladins}, messenger of the gods. He's the protector of the dwarven race.
Well, after some centuries I stopped to worry about time anymore.
Well, if you wander the world with open eyes, you will see the quests without asking.
Well, if you wander the world with open eyes, you will see the quests without asking.
Well, what do you expect kings to sell?
Well, go and buy some in the city.
Well, go and buy some in the city.
Well, our mines have been invaded by a basilisk. We trapped him with a cave in. The hero that brings me the body of this beast, will get a great reward.
Well, the gods handed the lands over to the younger races, but my people will leave this word in dignity.
Well, the gods handed the lands over to the younger races, but my people will leave this word in dignity.
Well, our people need no castle, our home IS a fortress.
Well, there are a lot of dungeons in the lands, waiting to be explored by the daring ones.
Well, we have almost no druids in our town. If need arises we can call for them from {Carlin}.
Well, we have some crossbowmen in our army but rely more on our knights.
Well, dwarfish knights are feared by our enemies in the whole world.
Well, the sorcerers are followers of the elemental powers.
Well, we dwarfs produced some of the greatest heroes of all times.
Well, it's up to the younger ones to slay the beasts that roam the lands and the tunnels.
Well, only a dead enemy is a good enemy.
Well, they are not as bad as one might think.
Well, we don't fear them. They seem more occupied with the humans anyway.
Well, well, well, the godblade. A myth? Perhaps. Even in my youth, it was only a legend.
Well, we are prepared even for him.
Well we are at peace with Carlin and {Thais}.
Well, it is a colony of this human king.
Well we are at peace with {Carlin} and Thais.
Well, I don't think our southern allies have agents in our town.
Well, the High {Paladin} is a woman that deserves respect. I admired most Elanes I met in my life.
Well, I am the emperor of the dwarfs and the oldest living dwarf, jawoll!
Well, more than 150 years ago, my father lost his beard overnight. Thereupon, he resigned from his leadership after hundreds of years of supreme ruling.
Well, I don't want to talk about my age.
WAAAH! Don't mention that beast! It was after the bones of our ancestors, last time King Tibianus visted us!
